document_data.name: Ichi Krijiku
document_data.mainbody: '''Ichi Krijiku''' was a [[bushi]] of [[Fochu Peninsula]] in [[Wa]].
document_data.Activities: Ichi Krijiku led the [[Soldiers of Iron]] [[kabukimono]] of the village of [[Seinin]] in Fochu Peninsula.
document_data.History: Ichi and his group lorded it over Seinin and the shoya [[Toi Jujishiki]] did nothing to stop them. In [[1358 DR]], Ichi and his men met [[Osari Minhiro]] and a foreign adventuring party and attacked them but were defeated.
